projects.title: Game of Loans
projects.bodyText:
- Built a game with **R shiny** connected to a **MySQL database** to teach a banking trainee skills in the industry in a low-risk manner with a fun and **interactive game**. 
 - This game aims to teach the concepts of **risk management** and maximising the utility of **idle capital**.

projects.title: Julius Baer x Tenity Intrapeneurship Competition, Winner
projects.bodyText:
- Led a team of 3 that won 1st place in a 8 week intrepreneurship competition at Julius Baer Innovation lab. Winning a **1 year full time contract** to carry out the project. 
 - Consulted the **business management team** and develop a prototype to help Julius Baer benchmark itself against its **competitors** and identify **new areas of growth**.
 - The sole presenter of the final pitch to the **C-suite leaders** of Julius Baer

projects.title: Rockewell Collins consulting project
projects.bodyText:
- Conducted comprehensive trend analysis and forecasting to predict future demand patterns, proposing solutions to achieve a projected 25% increase in operational efficiency
 - Built and developed a compelling pitch on our findings to present to group manager

projects.title: 2023 SUTD Littlefields industries simulation challenge, 1st place
projects.bodyText:
- Part of the team that secured first place in a competition with more than 100 participants. 
- Developed a strategy to optimize profits for a 150 days manufacturing service operations by balancing trade offs in machine purchase, order quantity, machine configuration and contract selection

projects.title: The analytics Edge Kaggle competition, 4th place
projects.bodyText:
- Part of the team that secured 4th place in a competition with over 100 participants hosted by the 40.016 The Analytics Edge Module.
 - Developed an ensemble machine learning method by combining gradient boosting, random forest and multinomial logit models to predict customer safety bundle choices from a dataset of 113 parameters

projects.title: Crop price forecasting
projects.bodyText: - Built a multiple linear regression model using python libraries such as numpy, panda and Dataframes to analyze the relations between crop price and price of pesticide

projects.title: Prove-a-childrens-game
projects.bodyText: - A simple educational game built using Python to help children learn mathematics

projects.title: Interactive Fountain
projects.bodyText: - To elevate the park going experience at Changi Business park, we designed an interative fountain using arduino and ultrasonic sensors
